field.filter: SELECT Service AS s JOIN SLA AS sla ON sla.service_id=s.id JOIN lnkContractToSLA AS ln ON ln.sla_id=sla.id JOIN CustomerContract AS cc ON ln.contract_id=cc.id WHERE cc.org_id =:this->org_id

SELECT Team AS t JOIN CustomerContract AS cc ON cc.support_team_id=t.id JOIN lnkContractToSLA AS ln ON ln.contract_id=cc.id JOIN SLA AS sla ON ln.sla_id=sla.id WHERE sla.service_id = :this->service_id AND cc.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Person AS p JOIN lnkTeamToContact AS l ON l.contact_id=p.id JOIN Team AS t ON l.team_id=t.id WHERE t.id = :this->workgroup_id
